name: Youkai Meiji
description:
Youkai Meiji is a 2D RPG made with RPG Maker. It is about humans at war with demons in the city of Kyoto. You play as Jun and learn about his past along with controlling his future through the choices you make.

A narrative game made in my writing class at UCI 2016. Credits go to my team:

Efren Aguilar, Monami Yang, Elaine Chieng, and me!

CONTROLS:
Arrow Keys for movement, Enter to talk and proceed dialogue, and hold Shift to run.
